desc: Most existing books on wavelets are either too mathematical or they focus on too narrow a specialty. This book provides a thorough treatment of the subject from an engineering point of view. It is a one-stop source of theory, algorithms, applications, and computer codes related to wavelets. This second edition has been updated by the addition of:

details.authors: Jaideva C. Goswami, Andrew K. Chan

title: Fundamentals of Wavelets: Theory, Algorithms, and Applications
